title: Relates to authorizing forms of licenses to include blood types
summary: Relates to authorizing forms of licenses to include the blood type of the licensee at the option of such person; authorizes the commissioner of motor vehicles, in consultation with the commissioner of health, to promulgate any rules and regulations necessary for the implementation of this act.
